Package co.lokblok.toughkeylib

Interface Toughkey

public interface Toughkey
Interface for managing data objects and lifecycle operations on a Toughkey smart card. Provides methods for connection handling, authentication, object management, and lifecycle operations. Compatible with Java on Android and importable into .NET MAUI.

All public methods throw ToughkeyException, which serves as a generic exception for all operational failures. Specific exceptions include CardCommException, CardCommandException, and AuthenticationException.

  • Method Details

    • openConnection

      void openConnection() throws ToughkeyException
      Opens a connection to the Toughkey device.
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if the connection cannot be established.

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the Toughkey device.

    • isInitialized

      boolean isInitialized() throws ToughkeyException
      Checks whether the Toughkey device is initialized.
      Returns:
      true if the device is initialized, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs while checking initialization

    • initialize

      void initialize(String password) throws ToughkeyException
      Initializes the Toughkey device with the provided password.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to initialize the device
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during initialization

    • zeroize

      void zeroize() throws ToughkeyException
      Erases all sensitive data on the Toughkey device.
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during zeroization

    • isLoggedOn

      boolean isLoggedOn() throws ToughkeyException
      Checks whether a user is logged on to the Toughkey device.
      Returns:
      true if a user is logged on, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs while checking the login state

    • logOn

      void logOn(String password) throws ToughkeyException
      Logs on to the Toughkey device using the provided password.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to authenticate the user
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during logon
      AuthenticationException - if authentication fails.

    • logOff

      void logOff() throws ToughkeyException
      Logs off the currently authenticated user from the Toughkey device.
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during logoff

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws ToughkeyException
      Changes the user's password on the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - the current password
      newPassword - the new password
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during the password change
      AuthenticationException - if authentication fails.

    • unblock

      void unblock(byte[] signature, String newPassword) throws ToughkeyException
      Unblocks the Toughkey device and sets a new password using a signature.
      Parameters:
      signature - the signature used for unblocking
      newPassword - the new password to set
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during unblocking

    • createObject

      void createObject(String label, byte[] value, Set<TKObject.ObjectPermission> permissions) throws ToughkeyException
      Creates a data object on the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the object
      value - the value of the object
      permissions - the permissions for the object
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during object creation

    • updateObject

      void updateObject(String label, byte[] value) throws ToughkeyException
      Updates an existing data object on the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the object to update
      value - the new value for the object
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during object update

    • deleteObject

      void deleteObject(String label) throws ToughkeyException
      Deletes a data object from the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the object to delete
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during object deletion

    • getObject

      TKObject getObject(String label, boolean fetchValue) throws ToughkeyException
      Retrieves a data object from the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      label - the label of the object to retrieve
      fetchValue - whether to fetch the value of the object
      Returns:
      the retrieved TKObject
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during retrieval

    • getObjectList

      List<TKObject> getObjectList(boolean fetchValues) throws ToughkeyException
      Retrieves a list of data objects from the Toughkey device.
      Parameters:
      fetchValues - whether to fetch the values of the objects
      Returns:
      a list of TKObject
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during retrieval

    • getObjectNames

      List<String> getObjectNames() throws ToughkeyException
      Retrieves a list of object names from the Toughkey device.
      Returns:
      a list of object names
      Throws:
      ToughkeyException - if an error occurs during retrieval
